articles.title: I wasn't planning to upgrade, but the Pixel 9 Pro XL changed my mind
articles.author: Kerry Wan
articles.summary: Google is charging more for its new Pixel phones this year. The standard model starts at $799, the Pro at $999 and the Pro XL at $1,099. On Amazon, the Pixel 9 Pro XL is $200 off, now costing $899.

articles.title: From skin struggles to soapy success: Kuching woman turns passion into natural skincare brand
articles.author: Bp Editor
articles.summary: Janet Yeo, 62, sells her own line of natural products at the 28th Kuching Natural Farmers' Market held yesterday at the MBKS covered car park. Yeo sells lotions, lip balms, oatmeal cleansing powder with coconut cream for the face and body, and scented room sprays.

articles.title: 27 Products That'll Give You A Taste Of What It Feels Like To Be On Top Of Your To-Do List
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: There are many products that make life easier and reduce time for food preparation and cleaning. They include a chop, slice, dice unit, a durable honeycomb drawer, a budget-friendly facial cleanser spray and a set of reusable bedsheets. Some of the products were sent as samples by BuzzFeed's editors.

articles.title: Mini desktop supercomputer coming this year — powerful enough to run advanced AI models and small enough to fit in your bag
articles.author: Alan Bradley
articles.summary: Nvidia has unveiled a line of AI supercomputers that can deliver unprecedented processing power in a portable, desktop-friendly chassis. The DGX Spark and DGX Station are powered by Nvidia's Blackwell Ultra platform and promise up to a petaFLOP in processing power. Blackwell Ultra is designed for massive-scale AI training and testing.

articles.title: Vaporwave Pop Up Shop
articles.author: Jacob Colliver
articles.summary: Home / Vaporwave Pop Up Shop is a very easy to use website to buy products from the popular music group's website. Jacob Colliver is the owner of the shop. He shares the website with Beat Magazine's editor-in-chief, Jake Colliver.

articles.title: Check out Samsung's Newest 8K Neo QLED 8K TV (It's Impressive)
articles.author: Jessica Fritsch
articles.summary: The 65-inch Class Neo QLED 8K QN900F Vision AI Smart TV is now available for purchase. Samsung's NQ8 AI Gen2 processor is designed to deliver an optimal 8K AI TV experience. The TV has a screen size of 65 inches and a resolution of 8K (7,680 x 4,320). It has a refresh rate of 120Hz and the capability to reach up to 165Hz in 4K.

articles.title: From hidden to highlighted: Mastering the new era of generative AI search
articles.author: Steve Bernas
articles.summary: AI-powered answer engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google Gemini are transforming how people find information. Businesses need to focus on providing clear, well-structured answers that AI can extract easily. Steve Bernas is president and CEO of the Better Business Bureau.

articles.title: realme Launches the C75—The New Benchmark for Durability
articles.author: Yomi Onileowo
articles.summary: The realme C75 is a revolutionary smartphone redefining durability and setting a new standard in everything proof. It is the first smartphone globally to achieve TÜV Rheinland's Rugged Smartphone Certificate and successfully pass the stringent MIL-STD 810H Military Grade Shock Resistance Test. The powerful G92 Max chip, paired with up to 24GB of Dynamic RAM, ensures smooth multitasking and effortless performance.

articles.title: Häagen-Dazs Unveils Salted Brown Butter Cookie Dazzler, Twist on Classic Ice Cream Sundae, at Shops
articles.author: Golden Gate Media
articles.summary: The Salted Brown Butter Cookie Dazzler is now available at Häagen-Dazs Shops across the U.S. until June 14. It's made with Salted brown butter ice cream, crispy chocolate chip cookies, rich hot fudge, and topped with a swirl of whipped cream.

articles.title: How to Check If a Phone Is Original Before You Buy It
articles.author: Tech City
articles.summary: How to check if a phone is original before you buy it. TechCity explains how to check a phone's authenticity before you purchase it. The market is full of imitations and clones, so you need to check the originality before buying a phone.

articles.title: Bad reviews to business revival
articles.author: Nilima Rahman
articles.summary: Entrepreneurs face many challenges when starting a business. The story of a small startup in the perfume industry illustrates these challenges vividly. The business set out to disrupt the market with an alcohol-free, sprayable perfume oil. Customers raised concerns about the product's quality and it received damaged bottles due to inadequate packaging. The company took decisive action to repair the damage.

articles.title: Smart enhances customer experience with Adobe AI
articles.author: Noemi Lardizabal-Dado
articles.summary: Smart Communications, the wireless services arm of PLDT, is teaming up with Adobe, a global digital experience company, to serve the telco's subscribers nationwide with a more data-driven and customer-centric approach. Smart is the first mobile operator in Southeast Asia to deploy the Adobe Experience Platform.

articles.title: SALTZMAN: Hands-on with soon-to-be-released Nintendo Switch 2 – is it worth it?
articles.author: Marc Saltzman
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 ($629.99) is the successor to Nintendo Switch, a gaming system lauded for its vast assortment of high-quality and (mostly) family-friendly games. It has a 7.9-inch LCD screen and twice the resolution of the original (1080p HD instead of 720p).

articles.title: Britannia unveils pilot to enhance retail experience for visually impaired
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Britannia Industries has announced the launch of the pilot leveraging Google Astra's capabilities to enhance retail experience for the visually impaired in a tie up with MORE Retail and Mithra Jyoti, an NGO dedicated to empowering visually impaired community. The solution identifies products, and access details such as pricing, ingredients, nutrition information and expiry dates.

articles.title: Amazon Wants to Do All Your Shopping for You—Even on Other Websites
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Amazon is beta testing a new product-buying feature called Buy for Me. It allows customers to buy products from third-party websites even if they're not currently sold on Amazon.com. Amazon doesn't take a percentage of the products sold through the feature.

articles.title: LG MyView Smart Monitor: All your multimedia in one screen
articles.author: LIOR NOVICK/MAARIV
articles.summary: The LG MyView Smart Monitor is a cutting-edge smart display designed to bridge the gap between work and entertainment. It comes with an intelligent operating system, built-in applications, and advanced connectivity options. The 34-inch screen delivers content in a 21:9 aspect ratio, with a QHD resolution (3440x1440) and a curved design. The monitor is equipped with HDR technology, supporting HDR10 industry standards and utilizing a 99% sRGB color gamut.

articles.title: BrandBeacon: AI search intelligence tool
articles.author: Maziar Foroudian
articles.summary: BrandBeacon is a powerful tool designed to help businesses understand their brand's presence in AI conversations and monitor their visibility across various AI platforms. It tracks brand mentions and descriptions across AI platforms and offers real-time analytics for marketing teams that require accurate data.

articles.title: Amazon directly targets Nvidia with bold new strategy
articles.author: Samuel O'Brient
articles.summary: Nvidia completed a successful week of product unveils and updates at the annual Nvidia GTC (global technology conference) 2025. This included the debuts of multiple highly anticipated GPUs and notable advances in robotic technology. Nvidia's stock has had a volatile performance over the past month.

articles.summary: Lava has launched its latest budget 5G smartphone, the Lava Bold 5G, at a price of Rs. 5,000. Lava is one of India's most promising smartphone brands and is based in Mumbai, India.   Read more here.

articles.title: Battery, Bump and Budget: Comparing Google Pixel 9A to Pixel 9, 9 Pro and 9 ...
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Google's newest budget phone packs surprises that stack up well against the rest of the nines. It's not cheap, but it's not too expensive, either. It costs $99.99 with a 30GB microSD card, and it has a microSIM card slot.

articles.title: You've Probably Been Sleeping On Amazon's 'Most Wished For' Section But These 44 Products Will Open Your Eyes
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: E.l.f's Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara is great for thin, delicate lashes. Schylling sells modern and retro toys, games, and sets. Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel can help reduce swelling and puffiness around the eyes with hyaluronic acid and caffeine.

articles.title: 'Superb' £19.95 window vac is that 'charges quickly' and is 'easy to use'
articles.author: Nadia Breen
articles.summary: The Tower Cordless Window Cleaner with Rechargeable Battery has received 885 reviews on Amazon and is now available for £19.95. Amazon is also offering the Kảrcher Window Vac WV 2 Plus with a microfibre cloth bundle for £59.99. Argos has the Beldray Cordless Handheld Handheld Window Vacuum Cleaner for £25.

articles.title: Saturday looking mostly cloudy after rainy morning
articles.summary: To stream KENS 5 on your phone, you need the KENS 5 app. It's free and available for Android and iOS devices. It is available on Google Play and Apple's Play Store. It costs about $0.99 per app.

articles.title: PSA 'Say Yes to the Dress' Fans: a Brand-New Season Premieres Tonight
articles.author: Adrianna Freedman
articles.summary: The new season of Say Yes to the Dress is premiering on TLC on Saturday, April 5, 2025 at 8 p.m. ET. Fans can watch new episodes of the TLC reality series online next-day on Discovery+. Max also has previous episodes of SYTTD on its website.

articles.title: I spent 24 hours using only the Motorola Razr and Galaxy Z Flip cover screens. Here's how it went
articles.author: Derrek Lee
articles.summary: The cover screen experience is one of the most important aspects of the modern flip phone. Motorola has pretty much set the standard on what a cover screen should be with its Razr smartphones, while Samsung has gone a different route with the external display on the Galaxy Z Flip line. Both offer similar experiences on both devices, and both have their strengths and weaknesses.

articles.title: Shimmer by Khuks undergoes soft reboot with new products
articles.author: Ameyaw Debrah
articles.summary: Shimmer by Khuks has launched a new line of high-end beauty products. The new products include pigmented, premium makeup essentials such as the Blink and Go Cluster Lashes and the Ridding Rub Cleansing Balm. Angie Safo, the founder and CEO of the brand, is grateful to the graphic designer CRAWN for his work on the brand's logo and packaging design.

articles.title: AI, logistics, sustainability: Test your business creativity with Edition 182 of our weekly quiz!
articles.author: Your Story
articles.summary: The 182nd quiz from YourStory tests your business acumen. Here are 5 questions to kick off this quiz.      .   "What are the questions to start this quiz?" is the first question.  "How do you answer it?"

articles.title: 24 Products That Work So Well, You May Want To Invest In Multiples
articles.author: Kaila Browner
articles.summary: An exfoliating body scrub, universal cleaning putty, dishwashing spray, hair-finishing stick and Crest 3D Whitestrips are some of the products that can help you keep your teeth whiter and prevent skin from getting dry and itchy.

articles.title: Nintendo played it safe with Switch 2 and I'm already disappointed - Reader's Feature
articles.author: Game Central
articles.summary: A reader is unimpressed with the Nintendo Switch Nintendo Direct and complains that only a minimum effort is being made with the games and hardware. He will probably buy a Switch eventually, but he's disappointed with the presentation of the Direct so far. The mystery 'C' button turned out to be a chat feature and mouse controls were just mouse controls. Mario Kart World (aka Mario Kart 9), Metroid Prime 4 and Super Mario Party Jamboree were released.

articles.title: All-new hybrid SUV added to Toyota lineup. How good is it?
articles.author: Michael Taylor
articles.summary: The new Toyota Signia SUV is called the Crown. It's the most expensive SUV in Toyota's line-up. Toyota wanted to make the Crown, the King of their lineup, the most important model in their lineup. It was made to replace the previous Crown.

articles.title: All-new hybrid SUV added to Toyota lineup. How good is it?
articles.author: Michael Taylor
articles.summary: Toyota's new Crown Sport Utility Vehicle is called 'A Sanctuary on the Road' Toyota wanted to make the Crown, the King of their lineup. It's almost achieved that goal with the new Crown Signia SUV. Toyota wanted the Crown to be the King.

articles.title: All-new hybrid SUV added to Toyota lineup. How good is it?
articles.author: Michael Taylor
articles.summary: Toyota's new Crown Sport Utility Vehicle is called 'A Sanctuary on the Road' Toyota wanted to make the Crown, the King of their lineup. It's almost achieved that goal with the new Crown Signia SUV. Toyota wanted the Crown to be the King.

articles.title: Infinix Note 50s first look and price  Anish Kapoor Exclusive 💯
articles.summary: Infinix is preparing to introduce a new smartphone in India that comes with a built-in mechanism that allows the device to release a light fragrance from its rear panel. The technology will make its debut with the upcoming Infinix Note 50s 5G+. This will be the first phone to have a technology like this and is expected to launch later this month. In an exclusive conversation with Times Now Tech and Digit, Anish Kapoor shared details about the new technology and also revealed the first look of the device in a Marine Drift Blue colour variant.

articles.title: Top 4 Hair Dryers for Daily Use: A Complete Guide
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Nova NHP 8216 Professional Hair Dryer is a professional hair dryer with dual heat control and high-speed airflow. VEGA VHDH-20N Insta Glam Foldable Hairdryer is light in weight and easy to store, ideal for daily and travel use. Philips ThermoProtect HP8144/46 is a compact model meant for everyday use.

articles.title: Amazon Alexa Fund expands AI investment strategy with five new focus areas
articles.author: Diya Poddar
articles.summary: Amazon's Alexa Fund is expanding its investment strategy with five new focus areas in artificial intelligence. The fund will back startups building future-facing AI tools and hardware, generative media, AI-powered robotics, next-generation AI architecture, specialised AI agents, and on-the-go devices.

articles.title: Top 4 Waterproof & Smudge-Proof Eyeliners for a Stylish Eye Makeup
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Lakmé Eyeconic Liquid Eyeliner in Green is ideal for those who enjoy experimenting with dramatic makeup for the eyes. Maybelline New York Colossal Bold Liner is smudge-proof and long-lasting. Blue Heaven Intense Easy Sketch Eyeliners are suitable for precise and precise finishes. FACES CANADA Ultime Pro A Matte Made In Heaven Ink Eyel liner is suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens users.

articles.title: Floors will be dry immediately after mopping if you use 1 household item
articles.author: Sophie Law
articles.summary: Cleaning expert shares sock mopping hack. Wearing a pair of bed socks over your shoes dries your floors as you mop. It's perfect for when you're in a rush or are expecting guests imminently. It also helps kill bacteria, germs and allergens.

articles.title: Walmart is selling a 'convenient' $90 folding hand truck for $37, and shoppers say it's 'sturdy and durable'
articles.summary: The M Buder Folding Hand Truck is on sale at Walmart for $37. It has a weight capacity of 500 pounds and is foldable by the click of a button. The hand truck is constructed of high-quality steel and weighs less than 8 pounds.

articles.title: I laughed at the idea of Snoop Dogg making gin — until I tried it
articles.author: Rob Buckhaven
articles.summary: Snoop Dogg and Dr. Dre have just launched a gin called Still G.I.N by Dre and Snoop. It's the second alcohol-based collaboration they've done together. The first was a range of premium, sparkling gin-based cocktails called Juice By Dre & Snoop, and the second is a wine range with 19 Crimes.

articles.title: flagship killer 2025
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: The OnePlus 13T 5G marks a refreshing shift in the premium smartphone market. It is a product of premium design and purposeful engineering. It has a 5G version of the 5G standard. It costs $499 and is available on Amazon.com.

articles.title: Huawei's R70k Mate XT smartphone now available in SA
articles.author: Faizel Patel
articles.summary: Huawei's Mate XT Ultimate Design tri-fold smartphone has just been launched in South Africa. It costs R70 000 and is available on contract for between R2 999 and R3 099 a month over 36 months on contract. It has a 10.2-inch tablet-sized display that folds into a pocket-friendly smartphone. The Mate X6 retails for R44,999 or between R1 599.00 and R1 799.

articles.title: Lava Bold 5G Amazon sale
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Lava has launched its latest budget 5G smartphone, the Lava Bold 5G, at a price of Rs. 5,000. Lava is one of India's most promising smartphone brands and is based in Mumbai, India.   Read more here.

articles.title: Lava Bold 5G Launched in India at ₹10,499: 3D Curved AMOLED Display, Dimensity 6300 & More
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Lava has launched its latest budget 5G smartphone, the Lava Bold 5G, at an aggressive price of ₹10,499. The phone is set to go on sale exclusively on Amazon.in starting April 8, 2025. It has a 6.67-inch 3D curved AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 8GB of RAM and an additional 8 GB of virtual RAM. The rear setup includes a 64MP main camera with a Sony sensor and a 16MP selfie camera. It runs Android 14.

articles.title: Gift-Giving Advice Via Generative AI
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Generative AI can help you decide what to get as a gift for a loved one and give helpful insights and suggestions to help you make a good choice. It's a useful tool for people who want to buy gifts for others. It can be downloaded from Google Play Store.

articles.title: 13 Walmart Dresses You'll Want To Wear To Every Event You Have Coming Up
articles.author: Emma Kershaw
articles.summary: Walmart has a selection of dresses for every occasion. The prices range from $35 to $100. Some of the dresses were sent as samples, but all were independently selected by our editors. Walmart's grocery selection is delivered right to your door.

articles.title: ChatGPT users have generated over 700M images since last week, OpenAI says
articles.author: Business Ghana
articles.summary: OpenAI's new image-generation feature is on track to be one of the company's most popular product launches ever. According to Brad Lightcap, over 130 million users have already downloaded the app.      .   i   in

articles.title: Nintendo played it safe with Switch 2 and I'm already disappointed
articles.summary: A reader is unimpressed with the Nintendo Switch Nintendo Direct and complains that only a minimum effort is being made with the games and hardware. The Zelda remasters are minor improvements, the wheelchair basketball game looked like something a junior programmer knocked up in an afternoon, and the Welcome Tour looks like something they made while on the toilet. Mario Kart World (aka Mario Kart 9), Mario Kart Prime 4 and an upgrade for Super Mario Party Jamboree were the only new games.

articles.title: MG Cyberster review: Stunning-looking roadster that packs a powerful electric punch, Lifestyle News
articles.summary: The MG Cyberster is a fully-electric open-top sports car. It's the first electric sports car on sale here that's reasonably accessible and reasonably affordable. It can go from 0-100 km/h in 3.2 secs and the roof folds away in 10 secs. The Cyberster's performance lives up to its looks. The AWD version of the Cyberster weighs 2 tonnes.

articles.title: Samsung S25 Ultra unveiled at Expo Jamaica
articles.summary: The new Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra was unveiled at Expo Jamaica 2025 courtesy of a partnership between Digicel, Samsung and Smart Mobile Solutions (SMS). The telecommunications company is offering a limited-time deal on the device for J$136,000 plus tax. Customers will also receive a free Samsung Galaxy Fit3 smartwatch and special discounts on other Samsung handsets for prepaid and postpaid customers.

articles.title: If You're One Step Away From Throwing Out Your Closet, These 25 Target Pieces Will Give It A Refresh
articles.author: Becca Glasser-Baker
articles.summary: All sizes in this post are listed in women's. Some samples may have been sent as samples, but all were independently selected by our editors. BuzzFeed and its publishing partners may collect a share of sales and/or other compensation from the links on this page.

articles.title: How To Build An Unforgettable Fragrance Wardrobe This Spring
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: This Spring, consider fragrances that reinvent signature florals or bold, classic scents. Here is a round up of the key scents for the Spring.    for this year's spring season. For more information, go to: www.vogue.com.

articles.title: Delta 8 Disposable Vape Pens Reviewed: Effects & Where to Buy
articles.summary: Delta 8 is THC's mellow cousin. It's a naturally occurring compound found in hemp. The easiest way to try it is with a Delta 8 disposable vape pen. Not all Delta 8 vapes are created equal. TRĒ House's Frosted Guava Live Rosin Liquid Diamonds Sativa THC Vape Pen is my go-to mood booster. Diet Smoke's Blue Dream Disposable Vape is tasty and smooth.

articles.title: Best body mists to let you keep smelling great for long; Our top 6 picks ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Fragrances have their own charm. If you are looking for a scent that lingers on, welcome body mists with open arms.   For more information on body fragrances visit: www.bathermists.com.  For deodorants, visit www.deodorant.co.uk.

articles.title: 'ஸ்ப்ளெண்டர் பிளஸ்' பைக்கை அப்டேட் செய்யும் ஹீரோ.. என்னென்ன மாற்றங்களுடன் வெளியாகிறது?
articles.summary: Hero To Updated Splendor is expected to be updated soon. There will be changes to Splendor as well as some new features added to the existing one.   For more information, visit: www.splendor.com/news/upcoming-changes.

articles.title: Expired breastmilk as soap? Ohio mom's unusual skincare fix wows some, makes others gag
articles.author: Trisha Sengupta
articles.summary: Leo Jude Soap Co. in Jackson, Ohio sells natural bathing products made from expired breastmilk. Some people are disgusted by the idea, while others find it fascinating and useful. Some of the customers have used the products for skin issues like eczema.

articles.title: Microsoft is testing out an all-new Windows 11 Start Menu design
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Microsoft is working on a Start Menu redesign for Windows again, but this time I think they're onto something. It's a start-menu redesign for the first time in a long time, and I think it's a good idea. It looks better than the previous one.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans rushing to buy game-changing clothes drying bargain in middle aisle – and it costs just €29.99
articles.author: Isabela Boechat
articles.summary: Vileda Steel Tower Clothes Dryer is set to be available in Lidl's middle aisle for €29.99. Vileda Spray and Clean Mop System is also featured in the middle aisle. Robot 2-in-1 Vacuum and Mop Cleaner will be available on Monday, April 7 for €99.

articles.title: Wash Day in Hungarian Settlement
articles.author: Alex Kropog
articles.summary: Washing machines in the early 1900s were non-existent. House wives used the 'rub-board,' No. 3 wash tub, outside boiling pot to heat water, lye soap and clothes lines and/or fences for drying the clothes. Octagon and Lye soaps were the primary soaps used.

articles.title: New to The Street to Broadcast Tonight at 9:30 PM PST on Bloomberg Television as Sponsored Programming Kevin Harrington, the Original Shark, Meets with The Sustainable Green Team to Discuss the Revolutionary Waterless Garden
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Tonight's episode of New to The Street will air on Bloomberg Television at 9:30 PM PST. It will feature innovative companies and market disruptors from New York and New York City.    For confidential support call the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-8255.

articles.title: New to The Street to Broadcast Tonight at 9:30 PM PST on Bloomberg Television as Sponsored Programming Kevin Harrington, the Original Shark, Meets with The Sustainable Green Team to Discuss the Revolutionary Waterless Garden
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: New to The Street will air tonight at 9:30 PM on Bloomberg Television as sponsored programming. It's the premier business television series highlighting innovative companies and market disruptors and will air on the Bloomberg Television channel.   Â  .

articles.title: New to The Street to Broadcast Tonight at 9:30 PM PST on Bloomberg Television as Sponsored Programming Kevin Harrington, the Original Shark, Meets with The Sustainable Green Team to Discuss the Revolutionary Waterless Garden
articles.author: New To The Street
articles.summary: Tonight's episode of New to The Street will air on Bloomberg Television at 9:30 PM PST. It will feature Roadzen, High Performance Battery, Health In Tech and The Motion of Gratitude. Kevin Harrington, the original Shark from Shark Tank, will be interviewed.

articles.title: Microsoft's $350 Windows 365 Link cloud client is now available
articles.author: Alfonso Maruccia
articles.summary: The Windows 365 Link is a device designed to connect users to Microsoft's cloud infrastructure. It cannot perform any productive tasks without first accessing a Microsoft cloud account. Redmond noted that its local processing capabilities are not as good as the cloud-connected device's.

articles.title: Amazon can now shop other websites on your behalf
articles.author: Shawn Knight
articles.summary: When searching for a branded product in the Amazon app, shoppers will be shown relevant results from Amazon and third-party sellers and when applicable, results from stores not currently on Amazon. Clicking a product labeled Buy for Me takes shoppers to a product page similar to others in the app.

articles.title: Trump to sign TikTok sale deadline extension
articles.summary: To stream WeAreIowa on your phone, you need the We are Iowa app.       iweareiabook.com.  Iweareibooks.com is a free app for Android and iOS users. It's available in English and Spanish.

articles.title: Washing machines will smell as 'good as new' if you clean it with 1 natural item
articles.author: Ella Kipling
articles.summary: Jack Callaghan recommends deep-cleaning washing machines every one to three months. White vinegar is an effective natural cleaner. It can be used as a 10-minute soak for metal plugs to remove water marks and scum and can be sprayed on stainless steel, glass, or mirrors for a streak-free finish.

articles.title: nubia Neo 3 Series arrives in PH offering gaming-focused features
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: nubia Philippines has officially launched the nubia Neo 3 series for Filipino gamers. The Neo 3 4G, 5G, and the Neo 3 GT models are available nationwide through the brand's stores and dealers, and online on Lazada and Shopee.

articles.title: LG 55G4 TV: €1399 Deal
articles.author: Your Name
articles.summary: LG's new 55G4 OLED TV aims to impress U.S. consumers with enhanced brightness and sleek design. The TV is expected to be available at major retailers like Best Buy, Amazon, and Costco. It's expected to cost between $1,799 and $1.999.

articles.title: Champion Xpress Carwash opening second Santa Fe location on Cerrillos Road
articles.summary: Champion Xpress Carwash plans to open at 1608 Cerrillos Road in Santa Fe on April 30. It will be the company's 23rd location in New Mexico. The new operation will begin with 15 employees and perhaps ramp up to 19, depending on the volume of business it does.

articles.title: The surprising £1 household item that can remove toilet stains
articles.author: Holly Kintuka
articles.summary: Shaving cream can be bought for as little as £1 and clean things in the home. It works for smudges and smears but also for annoying toilet stains like yellow toilet seat stains. The product is simply foaming shaving cream, which you can grab for as cheap as  £1 in Boots.

articles.title: The 8 Best Electric Razors for Men in 2025, Tested by Grooming Experts
articles.author: Garrett Munce
articles.summary: There are many reasons a guy might switch to an electric razor. Electric razors are easy to travel with, intuitive to use, and less expensive in the long run. A single electric razor can replace your entire shaving routine and declutter your bathroom shelf. Calvin Quallis, founder of grooming brand, and dermatologist Dr. Corey L. Hartman, MD, break it down.

articles.title: Lidl launches game-changing new click and collect service but there's a catch
articles.author: Ashley Bautista
articles.summary: Lidl's new Click, Reserve & Collect trial allows customers to reserve their favourite products up to two weeks in advance on the Lidl Plus app. The trial is being rolled out nationwide and customers can start using the app and the new feature right away.

articles.title: 'Deals and Steals' on products to boost your wellness
articles.author: Good Morning America
articles.summary: Tory Johnson is here with products to help you feel great from head to toe, starting at less than $5. Tory Johnson is available at Tory Johnson.com and is available in sizes 8-16, with prices between $5 and $50.

articles.title: Rare colorful lightning caught on camera by ISS astronaut. 'OK, this is kind of out there'
articles.author: Yahoo Daily News
articles.summary: "Catering to your inner Uber-Geek" is an app that caters to the inner geek's needs. It's kind of out there and caters for all tastes. It is available in English and Spanish. It can be downloaded from the app store.

articles.title: Smart enhances customer experience with Adobe AI
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: Smart Communications, the wireless services arm of PLDT, is teaming up with Adobe, a global digital experience company, to serve the telco's subscribers nationwide with a more data-driven and customer-centric experience. AI tools enable them to deliver the right offer, at the right moment, in the right context.

articles.title: Lady Victoria Hervey: ‘Trump told me that Boris has gone woke'
articles.author: The Daily Telegraph
articles.summary: Holly Candy told her to get this from Holly Candy's shop.    "Hollie Candy told me to get it."     .   - Holly Candy, Holly Candy said to get the item.  "I will get it".

articles.title: National Building fulfils prerequisite for TASI transition
articles.author: Eye
articles.summary: National Building and Marketing Co. announced today, April 3, the fulfillment of one of the prerequisites of its planned transition to the Main Market (TASI), as per the relevant implementing regulations. The company said the board report for the TASI transition was released today.

articles.title: BYD Sealion 7 Enters Crowded Midsize SUV EV Market – Can It Prevail?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: BYD has launched an electric midsize SUV called Sealion 7. The quality is high, but does it have enough to stand out from the crowd in this popular format? It's possible that it doesn't.    It's a good quality.

articles.title: Expired breastmilk as soap? Ohio mom's unusual skincare fix wows some, makes others gag
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Leo Jude Soap Co. in Jackson, Ohio repurposes expired breastmilk into soap. Most of the milk comes directly from local donors. Customers have used her soap for skin issues like eczema, psoriasis, and cradle cap, according to the owner.

articles.title: India, UAE to build strategic energy hub in Sri Lanka's Trincomalee
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: The hub will include a multi-product. It will be located in a central hub building. It is expected to be completed by the end of the year or early next year, depending on the progress of the project.   Â. Â

articles.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 is missing one small thing that speaks to a bigger problem
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2 has some nifty new features. It's a new console for the Nintendo Switch. It costs $60 for the basic version and $100 for the upgraded version. It has a new screen resolution. It also has a better screen resolution than the previous version.

articles.title: The Switch 2 Does Right By Switch 1 Controllers
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo's upcoming Switch 2 console is set to be released soon. The company has already shown off some of the features of the new console. It's expected to be even better than the previous version. It will be released on March 25th. It is expected to cost $60.

articles.title: Qingming: Seasonal delicacy
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Experience the delightful flavors of qingtuan, a traditional Chinese dish. It is served in traditional Chinese dishes.    for the first time in this restaurant. For more information, visit the website: http://www.qingtian.com.

articles.title: The Pune shop behind recent Bombay HC ruling that paved way for convenience stores to operate 24×7
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: New shop in Hadapsar represents a new wave of retail experiences, says the owner of the shop. The shop is located in the heart of the city, in the centre of Hadapsars. It is open from 9 am to 9 pm daily.

articles.title: AIML Announces Proposed Private Placement
articles.author: Pharmiweb
articles.summary: AI/ML Innovations Inc. intends to complete a non-brokered private placement offering of up to 40,000,000 units at a price of $0.05 per Unit for gross proceeds of $2,000.000. AI/ML will be listed on the CSE, OTC and FB.

articles.title: Banish mould from entire washing machine with one item engineers love
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: The engineer-approved item that clears mould from washing machines is the one thing that keeps washing machines fresh, clean and odour-free long-term. It's the one item that can remove mould from the entire washing machine and keep it fresh and clean.

articles.title: Some Nintendo Fans Will Have an Easier Time Pre-Ordering the Switch 2
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2 is set to launch on June 5th. Some people will have an easier time pre-ordering the Nintendo Switch than others, according to some sources.      Â   i.e. some people will be able to pre-order the Switch 2 more easily.

articles.title: Forget about Nintendo Switch 2 exclusives - there's a new free Pokemon game on Google, ...
articles.author: Games Radar
articles.summary: Free browser-based Pokemon game distracts you from buying a Nintendo Switch 2 pre-order. It will also help you assess the potential impact of tariffs and evolving market conditions on the Switch 2's price. It is free to play for a short time.

articles.title: International Soup Day: You should not leave Kolkata without trying these 6 global soups
articles.author: Subhadrika Sen
articles.summary: Thai Tom Yam Soup from Tess, Hyatt Centric Ballygunge Kolkata is on offer at the Hyatt Centre. It is served in a Thai Tom Yam soup. It costs Rs. 4.50 per serving. It's served in the hotel.
